alert.note: Alert for Custer; Lincoln; Logan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 10:13PM CDT until July 10 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Southeastern Logan County in west central Nebraska... Southwestern Custer County in central Nebraska... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1013 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Arnold to 14 miles west of Callaway to 14 miles north of Brady, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Arnold, Callaway, Finchville, Lodi and Milldale. This includes Highway 92 between mile markers 245 and 255. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
